                  "[{\"text\":\"
§l  A Hunter's Story§r

'Hello', I suppose I should write. A long time passed since I sharpened my charcoal and opened up a blank page, but today seems fitting facing yet another trial.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"It all started a long time ago after I did terrible things and rightfully so lost my standing in my community. As a result I got exiled and traveled the lands towards the East.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"The first season was unforgiving but with the skills of a Hunter I knew where to go and how to build myself a shelter. Countless seasons and many, many moons passed as I lived from what the forest had to offer.

 \"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"I guess i could've counted myself lucky.. Given the terrible things I did.

I had a roof, a fire and a good meal on my plate by sun set.
 \"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"To top it off I even had the music of the forest to wake me up and soothe me into sleep every single night.

At least until it suddently stopped.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"It started with unfamilair noises which slowly grew louder and closer with every passing night until finally the scratching started. I feared of what was outside but was not about to give up on my home. Or so I thought...\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Another season passed and by spring only silence remained. Not the monsters, not the wildlife... Nothing remained. This eventually force me to pack up my gear in an attempt to head North. Nothing however would have prepared me for the encounter I had.. have?\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"It was a dark night void of stars that marked my third in these lifeless woods. A blanket of thick grey fog rolled in over the moonlit forest. In the distance flickering lights acompanied by foul shadows moving in between the tall trees.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Silently with my back against the trunk of a tree I sat in my ditch hoping it would not become my grave. Leaves and branches covered the top in a attempt to hide myself from whatever roamed these woods.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"It was late in the night when I heard a noise that even I with all my experience couldn't place yet it sounded familiar. Moments passed until i saw a glimpse of it through the web of branches and leaves.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Its big hollowed out eyesockets stared right back at me as it stomped it's feet on the ground and made a neighing sound. It was clear to me it knew I was there and as foul as it looked without skin or flesh it did not make a move.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"That was when I noticed the undead it carried on its back shifting it's look right and left while it made this terrible sound.

Night after night it appeared again since that first encounter.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Sometimes far away, sometimes up close and sometimes even during day.\"}]"
                ],
                title:"The Moonlit Trap.",
                author:"Krandir the Hunter",
                display:{Lore:["A Hunter's encounter with the Legend of the Trap."]}
              }
